H0.text: In the Shakespeare play ‘King Lear’, what is the name of King Lear’s youngest daughter. Ophelia

H1.text: In the Shakespeare play ‘King Lear’, what is the name of King Lear’s youngest daughter. Beatrice

H2.text: In the Shakespeare play ‘King Lear’, what is the name of King Lear’s youngest daughter. Perdita

H3.text: In the Shakespeare play ‘King Lear’, what is the name of King Lear’s youngest daughter. Cordelia

A4.text: Cordelia's refusal to dedicate herself to him and love him as more than a father has been interpreted by some as a resistance to incest

A5.text: Lear's contest of love between Goneril, Regan, and Cordelia serves as the binding agreement
